_header: All hallowen day we holden one time in the year
_description: All Saints Day, in the South English Legendary — in couplets

BodAsh43.First Lines:
Alle halwen day we holdeþ one tyme of þe ȝereVor
                    uale enchesons holi chirch þerto ous gan lere…
BodAsh43.Last Lines:
…Nou bidde we alle halwen to holde hor feste soþat hi
                    bringe ous to þulke Ioie þat hi beþ Inne Ido

Bod779.First Lines:
Alle halewen day an erle we holdeȝ o tyme of þe
                    ȝereffor fele enchesones þer to holy cherche vs gan
                    lere…
Bod779.Last Lines:
…& brynge vs to þat ilke ioye þere þat hy
                    beþ inneIhesus for þy swete loue ne lete vs neuer
                    ablynne

BodLauMis108.First Lines:
Alle hilewene day we holdeȝ one time in þe ȝerefor
                    manie enchesones holie churche þare to us gan lere…
BodLauMis108.Last Lines:
…Nou bidde alle halewene þat we heore feste holden
                    soÞat huy us bringuen to þe heyȝe Ioye þare huy buth
                    inne ido
BodLauMis108.Editions:
Horstmann,  Carl,
                        ed.  
             The Early South-English Legendary.
EETS
         o.s. 87 (1887; repr. 1987): 418-20.

BodLauMis463.First Lines:
Alle halwen day we shol holden on tyme in þe ȝerfor fele
                    enchesons holy chirche þerto vs gan first lere…
BodLauMis463.Last Lines:
…Nou bide we alle halwen to holden here feste soþat
                    þei bringe vs to heye ioye þat þei beoþ inne y
                    do
BodLauMis463.Note: Two columns per page, one full-line, the other half-line.

CULAdd3039.First Lines:
All halogheȝ day oghe to be haldene ane tyme in þe
                    ȝereffor many enchesons it ordayned was als we in boke
                    lere…
CULAdd3039.Last Lines:
…Pray we til al haloweȝ we may so halde þaire
                    dayeþat we may come vn to ioye þere þai we in for
                    ay

CamMagPep2344.First Lines:
Alle halwen day we holdeþ in a tyme of þe ȝereffor
                    many enchesouns holy chirche þer to vs gan lere…
CamMagPep2344.Last Lines:
…Now bidde we alle halwen hare day to holde soÞat hi vs
                    bringe to þulke ioye þat hi beoþ on ydo

CamTCC605.First Lines:
Alle halwene day we holdeþ o tyme in þe ȝerefor fele
                    encheysens holy churche þer to ous gan lere…
CamTCC605.Last Lines:
…now byde we al halwen to hold here feste soÞat hii
                    bringe ous to þulke Ioie þat lasteþ euer mo

BLCottJulDIX.First Lines: Alle haluen dai we holdeþ one tyme of þe ȝerefor mony enchesouns holi cherche þer to ous gan lere…
BLCottJulDIX.Last Lines: …nou bidde we al walue to holde hor feste soþat hi bringe ous to þe heie ioie þat hi beþ Inne ido
BLCottJulDIX.Note: “Capitulum lxxiiii” added to left margin by later hand (f. 161v).
BLCottJulDIX.Facsimiles:
Digital Facsimile of British Library  Cotton Julius MS D IX.
         https://www.bl.uk/manuscripts/FullDisplay.aspx?ref=Cotton_MS_Julius_D_IX.

BLEge2810.First Lines: Alle Alwen day we holdiþ one time of þe ȝerevor vale enchesons holi churche þer to ous gan lere…
BLEge2810.Last Lines: …Nou bidde we alle halwine to holde hore feste soÞat hii bringe ous to þulke ioye þat hij buþ inne ido

BLEge2891.First Lines: Alle halwe day we holdeþ o tyme of þe ȝereffor fale enchesons of holy churche þerto us gan lere…
BLEge2891.Last Lines: …To þe heie wened of sein peter atte laste he wendeAnd þere he lay slepe adoun as god him grace sende…
BLEge2891.Note: Lines 1-54 only: ends imperfectly due to loss of folio between 164 and 165.

BLHar2277.First Lines: Alle halewe day we schulle holde o tyme in þe ȝereffor fele enchesoun holi churche þerto ous gan lere…
BLHar2277.Last Lines: …Nou bidde we alle halewen to holde here feste soÞat hi bringe ous to þe heȝe ioye þat hi beoþ on ido
BLHar2277.Facsimiles:
Digital Facsimile of British Library Harley MS 2277.
         https://www.bl.uk/manuscripts/FullDisplay.aspx?index=0&ref=Harley_MS_2277.
BLHar2277.Editions:
D’Evelyn,  Charlotte,  and  A. J. Mill, eds.  
             The South English Legendary: Corpus Christi College Cambridge MS. 145
                and British Museum MS. Harley 2277, with variants from Bodley MS. Ashmole 43 and
                British Museum MS. Cotton Julius D.ix.
EETS
         o.s. 235 (1959), 236 (1956); repr. 1967: 460.

BLSto949.First Lines: Alle halewyne day we holdeþ one tyme of þe ȝereffor vale enchesons holy chirche þer to vs gan lere…
BLSto949.Last Lines: …Nou bidde we alle halewe to holde hor feste soþat hii brynge vs to þe ioyȝe þat hii beþ inneyde

Lam223.First Lines:
Alle halowen day we holden here on þat tyme of þe
                    ȝereffor fele enchesouns holy chirche þerto con vs
                    lere…
Lam223.Last Lines:
…Þat þai pray Ihesu for vs þat we ne be
                    forloreNow bidde we all halewen þat ben to god ycore Amen

TokyoTak54.First Lines:
Alhalowen daye we holden oon tyme of þe ȝereFor many
                    resons holy chirch þerto vs doþ lere…
TokyoTak54.Last Lines:
…Now preye we to alhalowen to hold her fest soÞat
                    þei bringe vs to þat Ioye þer þei ben Inne do.
                    Amen.
